data.description: Access the lines of a file via a Perl hash
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I choose the namespace/module name because I believe it is
    intuitive and makes sense. If you know what Tie::File does, you can
    pretty much guess what Tie::File::AsHash does by the name alone.

    I searched CPAN high and low before authoring the module. The
    closest thing that I found to Tie::File::AsHash is the Tie::File
    module. I think my approach is unique because it allows users to tie
    human-readable files to a hash, versus DB_File and other modules
    that use non-human readable files.

    I believe the module should be in the module list because the
    module is unique, is useful to me, and I believe many others will
    find it useful.

    Thanks.
